Present location: INSTITUT DE PAPYROLOGIE ET D'ÉGYPTOLOGIE, UNIVERSITÉ DE LILLE III [02/049] LILLE
Name: Bowl
Description: Black and red bowl with a rounded-base and simple lip, both surfaces of which were burnished. Inside, the burnish created heavy horizontal marks, which is not the case on the outside. Additionally, red-coloured horizontal brush strokes were applied to the outside. The lip shows a rather wide "dents de loup" design ("wolf's teeth" motif). The gloss of the burnish has almost entirely disappeared.
